channel.title: Runserver.bat not working?
channel.description:
if u got a problem with ur runserver.
"like this"
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: DavidScape/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: DavidScape.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: DavidScape/Server. Program will exit. Trykk en tast for å fortsette...
there must be a problem in ur Variables or u need to put "classpath" and "path"
IF YOU DONT KNOW HOW TO DO "THEN" go to this topic
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html[/url]
i solved my problem with runserver becouse there where a problem with my path and classpath
look at that [code]"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin[/code]
if you got that when remove the [code]"[/code]

item.title: Runserver.bat not working?
item.dc:creator: @ahmed123123 ahmed123123
item.description:
@ahmed123123 wrote:

yep ur right but i got that problem for like 2 days ago. and i solved it. the problem was i got a problem with my Variables so i just solved this problem with removing the -->"<-- and its worked for me

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat not working?
item.dc:creator: @maxsuxx maxsuxx
item.description:
@maxsuxx wrote:

The thing if you get that error is it wrong coded some where in the source, often… i have got that problem many times and i have check the codes and found the problems, so i suggest you to make a copy of you soruce after you have update and check so it works

Read full topic

if u got a problem with ur runserver.

Could not find the main class: DavidScape/Server. Program will exit.
Trykk en tast for å fortsette…
